description: It is 100 years since Ireland's first Bloody Sunday, a mass shooting by British forces at a GAA match.
title: Bloody Sunday 1920: Croke Park killings remembered 100 years on
title_page: Bloody Sunday 1920: Croke Park killings remembered 100 years on - BBC News
maintext: Speaking about the event, President Higgins said: "That the events that took place can, in their brutality and casualness to the taking of life, still shock and challenge us all is to be understood.
